thread.title: Marc H
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Belgique / België Beoordeeld door Marc H

author: Marc H
title: Marc H
text: Since the confirmation that they'd taken my money, the only communication from Euroflorist has been this request to give them a rating. They didn't deliver the flowers. They didn't explain why they didn't deliver. They didn't acknowledge or respond to the emails I sent to them about this.
